metadata.title: CVE-2017-10972 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Uninitialized data in endianness conversion in the XEvent handling of theX.Org X Server before 2017-06-19 allowed authenticated malicious users toaccess potentially privileged data from the X server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.3
xdmx-tools - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.3
xmir - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.3
xnest - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.3

xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.3

xwayland - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.3
